name: Lil' Bob's Trip
description:
A 2d platformer whose character is Lil' Bob and you have use the power of dominating wall jumps to get trought the levels

Game made for the Mini Jam 123: Web 

The theme of the gamejam was "web" which refers to the spiderwebs but i used the theme web since its a webgame, Got it?

This gamejam was only 3-days long however i've made this game in almost 2 days, anyways I hope you enjoy it :) 

I will update it soon to add more things since i didnt have much time

CONTROLS Move A and D Jump Space Shoot F
